63  m_mesh = patch ;

70  m_mesh = NULL ;
71 
72 # if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI

82 VolumeKernel* LevelSetKernel::getMesh() const{
83  return m_mesh ;

89 void LevelSetKernel::clearGeometryCache( ) {
90 
91  std::unordered_map<long, std::array<double,3>>().swap( m_cellCentroids ) ;
92 
93 }
94 
98 void LevelSetKernel::updateGeometryCache( const std::vector<adaption::Info> &mapper ) {
99 
100  // If there are no cells in the mesh we can just delete all the cache
101  if ( m_mesh->getCellCount() == 0) {
102  clearGeometryCache();
103  return;
104  }
105 
106  // Remove the previous cells from the cache
107  for ( auto & map : mapper ){
108  if( map.entity != adaption::Entity::ENTITY_CELL ){
109  continue;
110  }
111 
112  for ( auto & previousId : map.previous){
113  auto centroidItr = m_cellCentroids.find( previousId ) ;
114  if ( centroidItr == m_cellCentroids.end() ) {
115  continue ;
116  }
117 
118  m_cellCentroids.erase( previousId ) ;
119  }
120  }
121 
122 }
123 
133 const std::array<double,3> & LevelSetKernel::computeCellCentroid( long id ) {
134 
135  auto centroidItr = m_cellCentroids.find( id ) ;
136  if ( centroidItr == m_cellCentroids.end() ) {
137  centroidItr = m_cellCentroids.insert( { id, m_mesh->evalCellCentroid( id ) } ).first ;
138  }
139 
140  return centroidItr->second;
141 
142 }
143 
149 double LevelSetKernel::computeCellIncircle( long id ) {
150 
151  VolumeKernel *patch = getMesh();
152  Cell &cell = patch->getCell(id);
153 
154  const long* interfaceIds = cell.getInterfaces();
155  int interfaceCount = cell.getInterfaceCount();
156 
157  std::array<double,3> cellCenter = computeCellCentroid(id);
158 
159  double radius = std::numeric_limits<double>::max() ;
160  for (int k = 0; k < interfaceCount; ++k) {
161  long interfaceId = interfaceIds[k];
162  double r = norm2(cellCenter - patch->evalInterfaceCentroid(interfaceId));
163  radius = std::min(radius, r);
164  }
165 
166  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
167  int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
168  for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
169  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
170  double r = norm2(cellCenter - patch->getVertexCoords(vertexId));
171  radius = std::min(radius, r);
172  }
173 
174  return radius;
175 
176 }
177 
183 double LevelSetKernel::computeCellCircumcircle( long id ) {
184 
185  VolumeKernel *patch = getMesh();
186  Cell &cell = patch->getCell(id);
187 
188  const long* interfaceIds = cell.getInterfaces();
189  int interfaceCount = cell.getInterfaceCount();
190 
191  std::array<double,3> cellCenter = computeCellCentroid(id);
192 
193  double radius = -std::numeric_limits<double>::max() ;
194  for (int k = 0; k < interfaceCount; ++k) {
195  long interfaceId = interfaceIds[k];
196  double r = norm2(cellCenter - patch->evalInterfaceCentroid(interfaceId));
197  radius = std::max(radius, r);
198  }
199 
200  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
201  int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
202  for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
203  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
204  double r = norm2(cellCenter - patch->getVertexCoords(vertexId));
205  radius = std::max(radius, r);
206  }
207 
208  return radius;
209 
210 }

218 bool LevelSetKernel::isPointInCell(long id, const std::array<double,3> &pointCoords){
219  return getMesh()->isPointInside(id,pointCoords);
220 }
221 
230 double LevelSetKernel::isCellInsideBoundingBox( long id, const std::array<double, 3> &minPoint, const std::array<double, 3> &maxPoint ){
231 
232  const Cell &cell = m_mesh->getCell(id);
233  double tolerance = m_mesh->getTol();
234 
235  std::array<double, 3> cellMinPoint;
236  std::array<double, 3> cellMaxPoint;
237 
238  cellMinPoint.fill( std::numeric_limits<double>::max() ) ;
239  cellMaxPoint.fill( - std::numeric_limits<double>::max() ) ;
240 
241  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
242  int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
243  for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
244  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[i];
245  const std::array<double, 3> &vertexCoords = m_mesh->getVertexCoords(vertexId);
246  for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d) {
247  cellMinPoint[d] = std::min( vertexCoords[d] - tolerance, cellMinPoint[d]) ;
248  cellMaxPoint[d] = std::max( vertexCoords[d] + tolerance, cellMaxPoint[d]) ;
249  }
250  }
251 
252  return CGElem::intersectBoxBox(minPoint, maxPoint, cellMinPoint, cellMaxPoint);
253 }
254 
261 const std::array<double,3> & LevelSetKernel::getVertexCoords(long vertexId)
262 {
263  return m_mesh->getVertexCoords(vertexId);
264 }

266 # if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
267 
271 void LevelSetKernel::initializeCommunicator()
272 {
273  // The communicator has to be valid
274  MPI_Comm communicator = m_mesh->getCommunicator();
275  if (communicator == MPI_COMM_NULL) {
276  throw std::runtime_error ("Levelset communicator is not valid");
277  }
278 
279  // Communication can be set just once
280  if (isCommunicatorSet()) {
281  int comparison;
282  MPI_Comm_compare(communicator, m_communicator, &comparison);
283  if (comparison == MPI_IDENT || comparison == MPI_CONGRUENT) {
284  return;
285  } else {
286  throw std::runtime_error ("Levelset communicator cannot be modified.");
287  }
288  }
289 
290  // Create a duplicate of the patch communicator
291  MPI_Comm_dup(communicator, &m_communicator);
292 }
293 
298 MPI_Comm LevelSetKernel::getCommunicator() const {
299 
300  return m_communicator;
301 }
302 
309 bool LevelSetKernel::isCommunicatorSet() const {
310 
311  return (getCommunicator() != MPI_COMM_NULL);
312 }
313 
317 void LevelSetKernel::freeCommunicator() {
318 
319  if (!isCommunicatorSet()) {
320  return;
321  }
322 
323  int finalizedCalled;
324  MPI_Finalized(&finalizedCalled);
325  if (finalizedCalled) {
326  return;
327  }
328 
329  MPI_Comm_free(&m_communicator);
330 }
331 
332 #endif
333 
334 }
